mapper.sql: id, status, owner_id, auditor_id, modify, execution, execution_time, results, query_results, overdue_results, data_Source
mapper.select: select a.id, a.status, a.owner_id, a.auditor_id, modify, a.execution, a.execution_time, a.results, a.query_results, a.overdue_results, a.data_Source,a.content, a.query, b.nick_name owner,c.nick_name auditor from submission a LEFT JOIN sys_user b ON a.owner_id = b.id LEFT JOIN sys_user c ON a.auditor_id = c.id where a.owner_id = #{userID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into submission (id, status, owner_id, auditor_id, modify, execution, overdue_results, data_Source, content,query_results query) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ownerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{auditorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modify,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{execution,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{overdueResults,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dataSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{query,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},#{queryResults,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update submission
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
owner_id = #{ownerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
auditor_id = #{auditorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
modify = #{modify,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
execution = #{execution,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
execution_time = #{executionTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
results = #{results,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
query_results = #{queryResults,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
overdue_results = #{overdueResults,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
data_Source = #{dataSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
query = #{query,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
